import requests

params = {''appids'': ''620'', ''l'': ''english''}

    response = requests.get(url, params=params, timeout=10)
    data = response.json()
    app_data = data[''620''][''data'']
    
    # 查找所有包含positive/negative/review的字段
    review_keys = [k for k in app_data.keys() if any(word in k.lower() for word in [''review'', ''positive'', ''negative'', ''rating''])]
    print(''Review/Rating related keys:'', review_keys)
    
    # 查找百分比相关
    percent_keys = [k for k in app_data.keys() if ''percent'' in k.lower()]
    print(''Percent related keys:'', percent_keys)
    
    # 查找评分相关
    score_keys = [k for k in app_data.keys() if any(word in k.lower() for word in [''score'', ''rating''])]
    print(''Score/Rating keys:'', score_keys)
    
    # 查找overall相关
    overall_keys = [k for k in app_data.keys() if ''overall'' in k.lower()]
    print(''Overall keys:'', overall_keys)
    
except Exception as e:
